description:
Launch and land your boat without soaking your lower legs. Integrated socks let you wade fearlessly up to your thighs. These paddling pants are made of breathable fabric that ensures you’ll stay comfortable no matter how hard you're working.

  • Hydrus 3-layer waterproof-breathable fabric has a soft polyester inner for moisture transport, a polyurethane micro-porous coating, and a rugged nylon outer with a DWR finish
  • Seams are factory sealed
  • Neoprene waistband with adjustable hook-and-loop tabs for a snug, comfortable fit
  • Gravel guards on the socks reduce wear (though water shoes or boots are recommended)
name: Kokatat Hydrus Tempest Pants - Women's
